COMMENT_TX: $Lowell sprained his left thumb diving for the grounder
Red Sox third baseman Mike Lowell left the game due to a sprained left thumb
$Big shift accounts for odd GDP
$2:11 rain delay
$7th slam at Fenway for Ortiz to tie Ted Williams and Jim Rice for most in the park
ej,ramim002,P,emmep901,Called third strike Red Sox left fielder Manny Ramirez ejected by HP umpire Paul Emmel
$Patriots Day in Massachusetts; morning start due to Boston Marathon
Rangers pitcher Kason Gabbard left the game due to an injured back
Debut game for Justin Masterson
Red Sox right fielder J. D. Drew left the game due to an injured leg

ej,gibbj001,M,drecb901,Balk call $Coco Crisp appeared to fly out to RF to end the game but 2B umpire Bruce Dreckman called a balk on B.J. Ryan, thus negating the play; Blue Jays Manager John Gibbons ejected by 2B umpire Bruce Dreckman
2:27 rain delay before game
$into the front row of Monster Seats
$HP umpire Doug Eddings called Lugo out when the ball bounced up and struck the batter; Lugo was still in the batter's box at the time; the Red Sox argued the call to no avail; the interference stood
Debut game for Mark DiFelice
$Lester throws the 18th Red Sox no-hitter, just two years removed from cancer treatments
$the tenth time the Red Sox have hit two slams in one game, the most of any team
$hit on the left hand, breaking his index finger; onto the 15-day disabled list after the game
$Pedroia hit a ball down the RF line that curved around the pole fair but was called foul by 1B umpire Jeff Kellogg
$Boston pitcher Josh Beckett slipped as he delivered a pitch to Cliff Floyd; he was OK
$Rays SS Jason Bartlett put his knee down in front of the 2B bag on Coco Crisp's SB; Crisp sprained his left thumb on the play
$Crisp rounded the 3B bag too far and Bartlett threw behind him
ej,uptob001,P,emmep901,Called third strike Rays center fielder B. J. Upton ejected by HP umpire Paul Emmel
$Coco Crisp took out 2Bman Akinori Iwamura with his slide as a reaction to Bartlett's covering the bag in the sixth
$when Rays manager Joe Maddon went to the mound for the pitching change, he yelled something at the Red Sox dugout to Coco Crisp; they exchanged angry words before the umpires intervened

ej,crisc001,P,kellj901,Fight after intentional HBP ej,gomej001,P,kellj901,Fight after intentional HBP by Shields ej,shiej002,P,kellj901,Fight after Intentional HBP $James Shields hit Coco Crisp on the leg as retaliation for Crisp's hard slide into second the previous day; Crisp charged the mound and dodged the punch thrown by Shields; Crisp then threw a glancing blow at Shields and then Dioner Navarro tackled Crisp; both benches emptied; Crisp, Shields and Jonny Gomes ejected by HP umpire Jeff Kellogg
Debut game for Chris Carter
Ellsbury made a sliding catch and rolled his wrist under
Red Sox Jacoby Ellsbury left the game due to a strained right wrist
Red Sox DH Manny Ramirez left with hamstring problems
$this home run went completely over the LF wall and seats into the parking lot across the street; it is #504 for Ramirez, to tie with Eddie Murray for 23rd on the all-time list
$at this point, both pitchers are throwing knuckleballs
$the first error at 1B by Youkilis in 238 games, stopping his major league record streak
$over the Monster Seats onto Lansdowne St.; #505 for Ramirez to pass Eddie Murray

$Roberts made a diving stop to his left and threw the ball from the ground; Millar threw the ball around the infield after the putout but started by throwing it to Roberts, who was still on the ground; the Red Sox dugout made lots of comments to their former teammate
$Millar fouled the first pitch off his left knee
fan interference
$Salazar left with cramps in his legs
Cardinals shortstop Cesar Izturis left the game due to an injured leg
Debut game for Chris Smith
Debut game for Nick Stavinoha
fan interference

$Red Sox first baseman Kevin Youkilis was hit on the face by a warm up throw between innings and left the game; the ball was thrown by Mike Lowell and short-hopped Youkilis; it struck Youkilis under the right eye
$during the pitching change, Red Sox left fielder Manny Ramirez went into the scoreboard room in the wall and was seen in the camera window talking on a cell phone

ej,gardr001,M,relic901,Changed call from catch to non-catch $the play was ruled a catch on Varitek's sinking line drive and Casey and Lowell were each put out for a triple play; then the umpires huddled and ruled that the ball was trapped; each runner moved up one base; Twins manager Ron Gardenhire argued the call and was ejected by 1B umpire (and crew chief) Charlie Reliford
ej,tremd801,M,eddid901,Called third strike on Kevin Millar Orioles Manager Dave Trembley ejected by HP umpire Doug Eddings
Red Sox first baseman Kevin Youkilis left the game due to a triceps contusion

$the third pitch to Youkilis was high and inside, causing him to hit the ground as the ball hit the bat; both sides were warned; Chamberlain had been suspended in 2007 for throwing two pitches over Youkilis's head and three at him again on 7/7/2008
